San_Rafael.Larkspur Landing station: Larkspur Landing is an under-construction Sonoma–Marin Area Rail Transit station in Larkspur, California. The station is expected to open in early 2019. (Service had previously been estimated in 2018.) It is located across Sir Francis Drake Blvd 1⁄3 mile (0.5 km) from the Larkspur Ferry Terminal, from which it gets its name.
